channel.title: How-to Guides on ENBUILD
channel.description: Recent content in How-to Guides on ENBUILD

item.title: Deploying ENBUILD for Local Testing
item.description: Follow these step-by-step instructions to deploy ENBUILD locally for testing. Prerequisites Existing Kubernetes Cluster Ensure that you have access to a Kubernetes cluster and obtain the KubeConfig file.

item.title: ENBUILD Repositories
item.description: GitLab Resources The following table contains groups and repositories for ENBUILD. Name Description iac-templates All ENBUILD Catalog Item Templates are located in this Group.
